title: 1327-E
statement: E. Count The Blockstime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputYou wrote down all integers from $$$0$$$ to $$$10^n - 1$$$, padding them with leading zeroes so their lengths are exactly $$$n$$$. For example, if $$$n = 3$$$ then you wrote out000,001, ...,998,999.A block in an integer $$$x$$$ is a consecutive segment of equal digits that cannot be extended to the left or to the right.For example, in the integer $$$00027734000$$$ there are three blocks of length $$$1$$$, one block of length $$$2$$$ and two blocks of length $$$3$$$.For all integers $$$i$$$ from $$$1$$$ to $$$n$$$ count the number of blocks of length $$$i$$$ among the written down integers.Since these integers may be too large, print them modulo $$$998244353$$$.InputThe only line contains one integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1 \\le n \\le 2 \\cdot 10^5$$$).OutputIn the only line print $$$n$$$ integers. The $$$i$$$-th integer is equal to the number of blocks of length $$$i$$$.Since these integers may be too large, print them modulo $$$998244353$$$.ExamplesInput1Output10Input2Output180 10

processed.result:
You are given an integer $n$.  You need to write down all integers from 0 to $10^n - 1$, padding them with leading zeroes so they are all $n$ digits long. For example, if $n = 3$, you would write 000, 001, ..., 998, 999.

A "block" in an integer is a consecutive group of the same digit that cannot be extended further in either direction. For example, in the integer 00027734000, there are three blocks of length 1, one block of length 2, and two blocks of length 3.

For each integer $i$ from 1 to $n$, count the number of blocks of length $i$ in all the numbers you wrote down.  Print the count for each $i$ modulo 998244353.

You are given a number 'n'.  You need to count how many times each block size (1, 2, 3,... n) appears in a sequence of numbers generated by listing all numbers from 0 to 10^n - 1, padded with leading zeros to have 'n' digits.  Print the count for each block size modulo 998244353.
